TneTabControl.TabAnimation Property

Summary

Enables Tab Animation

Namespace: neTabControl
Syntax
Delphi
published
 property TabAnimation: TShowTabanimation read GetTabAnimation write setTabAnimation;

Property Value

Type: TShowTabanimation

 

Remarks

Value
Description

taNone

No animation (Default)

taFade

Fade in
